items.title: Hurricane Melissa live updates: 'Catastrophic' storm set to make landfall in Jamaica
items.description: Hurricane Melissa, now a powerful Category 5 storm, is set to be Jamaica's worst storm in history.

items.title: WATCH:  Lobby of luxury Florida hotel flooded amid storms
items.description: Experts said the storm unleased rains comparable to what the region saw from a hurricane in 2022.

items.title: WATCH:  Japanese PM gifts Trump late Shinzo Abe's putter
items.description: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi gifted President Trump the putter of late Japanese prime minister Shinzo Abe during his visit to Tokyo.
